ref: 9972 máhiṣī f. ʻ king's chief wife ʼ RV. [Same as máhiṣī -- f. ʻ buffalo cow ʼ RV. s.v. mahiṣá -- : cf. Ir. *mazišī in Khot. mijṣe' ʻ woman ʼ H. W. Bailey BSOAS xiv 432 who connects it with mahilā -- . -- mah -- ]
Pa. agga -- mahēsī -- f. ʻ king's chief wife ʼ,

lang: MIA. forms occurring in Corpus Inscriptionum Indicarum Vol. II Pt. 1
